MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the LL55 Postcode area of Caernarfon. It will necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown, to repair a fault on our underground cable network and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 3AM. We will update this message if this information changes We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1.07AM on 24th December 20202.
